label: Bug-13
title: all schemas created in the Issuses_UI project should have __Issues__ in the name
description:
for for example


class Schema__Node__Info(Type_Safe):                                              # Node discovery info
    label     : Safe_Str__Node_Label                                              # e.g., "Task-6"
    path      : Safe_Str__File__Path                                              # e.g., "data/project/Project-1/issues/..."
    node_type : Safe_Str__Node_Type                                               # e.g., "task"

Schema__Node__Info should (at least) be Schema__Issue__Node__Info

Safe_Str__Node_Label -> Safe_Str__Issue__Node_Label
Safe_Str__Node_Label -> Safe_Str__Issue__Node_Label
Safe_Str__Node_Type  -> Safe_Str__Issue__Node_Type
